column3: フン――貴様ラ人間ニ、関係アルノカ？
column4: Hmph—Does it concern you humans in any way?

column3:
ダガコレダケ教エテヤル
――命乞イナラ今ノウチダ
column4:
I'll tell you this much—
if you want to beg for your life, now is the time.

column3: 何だと――？
column4: What --?

column3:
おーく軍ハ、スグチカラヲ溜メ、戻ッテクル
ソシテ俺ヲ助ケ出シ、チッポケナ人間ドモヲ
マタ奴隷ニスルノダ
column4:
The orc army will soon gather its 
strength and come back. 

They'll rescue me and turn you insignificant 
humans into slaves again.

column3: このオーク――かなり自信があるらしいな
column4: This orc—he seems to be quite confident.

column3:
オーク軍の情報を引き出すには
この鼻っ柱をへし折ってやるか
column4:
To get the orc army's information, 
we might need to crush this arrogance.

column3:
あるいは、口を滑らしてしまうような
上機嫌にさせる証拠があると
良いんだが――
column4:
Alternatively, it would be ideal to have some 
evidence that puts them in such a good mood 
that they might slip up.

column3: 脅す
column4: Threaten

column3: 《証拠》を突きつける
column4: Present the evidence

column3: ――やめる
column4: -- Stop

column3: いや、お前の話を疑うつもりは無い
column4: No, I don't doubt your story.

column3:
実はここだけの話なんだが――
引いたはずのオーク軍がいくらか
この街に戻っているという噂があってな
column4:
Actually, between you and me--
There are rumors that some of the orc forces, 
which were supposed to have withdrawn, 
are returning to this city.
-- what?

column3:
まさか、あのオーク軍がたった1人のオークを
救うため戻ってくるとはにわかに信じ難いが――
column4:
It's hard to believe that the orc army would 
return just to save one orc, but――

column3: グァッハッハッハ！　ヤハリナ！
column4: Guhahaha!　I knew it!

column3:
貴様ラ皆殺シニシテヤル！
アノめがど奪取以降、マタ人間ノ血ヲ
浴ビラレル時ガ来タノダ！
column4:
You will all be killed!
After the capture of Megado, 
it's time once more to be soaked in human blood!!

column3: メガド奪取以降――か？
column4: After the capture of Megado ――?

column3:
お前はオーク軍に占領されていた頃から
メガドにいたのか？
column4:
Have you been in Megado since it 
was under Orc occupation?

column3:
フン、当然ダ！ 
常ニ最前線ニ、在ルコトコソ戦士ノ証
column4:
Well, of course! 
Always being on the front lines is the mark of a warrior.

column3:
人間ドモガ、愚カナ反抗ヲ起コシタラ
ソノ時、伝令兵ガイナケレバ
一体誰ガ事態ヲ伝達スル！
column4:
If the humans start a foolish rebellion, 
who will report the situation if 
there are no messengers?

column3: ――覚者、聞いたか？
column4: -- Did you hear that, Arisen?

column3:
どうやらこのオークは
占領下のメガドについて詳しいようだぞ
column4:
It appears this orc is knowledgeable 
about Megado during its occupation.

column3:
もしかすると、ナヴィドの悪事の証拠を
入手できるかもしれないな
街に増えるオークどもの真意も気になるが――
column4:
We might be able to gather 
evidence of Navido's wrongdoings. 

I'm also curious by the true motives of the 
growing number of orcs in the city.

column3:
まずは上機嫌で口が軽くなっている今
占領下の<NPC 681>の情報を聞き出そう
column4:
Since he's in high spirits and more 
inclined to talk, 
let's extract information about <NPC 681> 
during the occupation period.

column3:
このオークは繰り返していた――
"今にオークの仲間が、体勢を立て直し
  メガドを再侵攻し、俺を助けに来るはずだ"――と
column4:
The Orc repeatedly said—
"Soon, my fellow Orcs will recover, re-attack 
Megado, and come to rescue me."

column3:
グアハハ！　ソウダ！
ヤット命乞イヲスル準備ガデキタカ！
column4:
Guahaha!　That's right!
I'm ready for you to beg for your life!

column3:
確かに、街にはオークが増えている
目撃者の証言によると
"奴らは何かを探しているようだ"――だとさ
column4:
The orcs are indeed increasing in the city. 
Witnesses say, 
"They seem to be searching for something."

column3:
その《証拠》を突きつけたせいでヤツは今
超がつくほど上機嫌な訳だが――チャンスでもある
今なら、他の《話題》でも口が軽くなっているはずだ
column4:
Confronting him with that "evidence" has put him 
in a surprisingly good mood—giving us a chance. 
He should be more forthcoming 
about other "topics" now.

column3:
伝令兵なのに、前線で動いていたなんて
随分と危険な任務をしていたんだな？
column4:
You're a messenger and you've been 
working on the front lines.
You've been on some pretty dangerous missions, 
haven't you?

column3:
グァッハッハッハ！ 
当然ダ
危険デアレバアルホド、名誉ナ任務ナノダ！
column4:
Guhahaha! 
Of course,
it's dangerous, an honorable mission!

column3:
前線にいたということは、人間達とも
接する機会が多かったんじゃないか？
column4:
Being on the front line meant that there were 
many opportunities to interact with humans, right?

column3: 例えば――ナヴィド侯爵とか
column4: For example — Marquis Navido

column3:
ナビ――何ダト？
人間ノ名ナド、イチイチ覚エテイナイ！
column4:
Navi - what?
I can't remember every single human name!

column3:
伝達兵なら何度か関わりがあっても
良さそうなものだがな
名前だけではわからないか――
column4:
You should be able to recognize a messenger if 
you've interacted with them multiple times. 
Is the name not enough?

column3: 脅す
column4: Threaten

column3: 《証拠》を突きつける
column4: Present the evidence

column3: ――やめる
column4: -- Stop

column3: おお、確かにこれなら分かりやすいな
column4: Oh, this makes it much clearer.

column3:
ホラ、この人間だ
人間達のリーダーだったそうだから
覚えているんじゃないか？
column4:
Look, it's this human. 
He was their leader, 
so you probably know him, right?

column3: コ、コイツハ――
column4: This..... this guy--

column3: ん？ どうやらピンと来たみたいだな
column4: Hmm? Looks like it rang a bell.

column3: グルルル――ソノ不快ナ顔見セルナ！
column4: Grrrrr――Don't show me that vile face!

column3:
ひょっとすると――コイツが鍵を握っているかもな
<NPC 681>について知っていること――
全て聞き出してやろうぜ
column4:
He might be the key――
let's make him reveal everything he knows 
about <NPC 681>――

column3:
そうだな――まずはメガドで
常識となりつつある、<NPC 681>の
英雄譚について真偽を確かめよう
column4:
Indeed――first, let's verify the truth of the 
legend of <NPC 681>, 
which is becoming common knowledge in Megado.

column3: 脅す
column4: Threaten

column3: 《証拠》を突きつける
column4: Present the evidence

column3: ――やめる
column4: -- Stop

column3:
ナヴィドはメガド占領中
人間達のリーダーを務めていたそうだな
column4:
It seems that Navido was the human leader during 
the occupation of Megado.

column3:
人間達をまとめ、オーク達との間を
取り持っていたと聞いているが
それは間違い無いのか？
column4:
I've been told they brought the humans together 
and mediated with the orcs—can you confirm that?

column3:
――ウグウゥ
確カニ――奴ハ人間ノ分際デ、出シャバリ
奴隷ドモノ、統括ヲ始メタ――
column4:
Ugh... 
Yeah, that human had the nerve to interfere 
and manage the slaves...

column3:
市民たちの話は事実だった、のか？
じゃあ、奴は本当に潔白だった――
column4:
So the citizens were telling the truth?
So he really was innocent--

column3:
ケッパク――潔白――？
グフ――グッフッフ――
column4:
Innocent—really?
Guh—Guhahaha—

column3:
――なんだ
何がおかしい？
column4:
I'm -- 
What's so funny?

column3:
まだ何か――話していない<NPC 681>の
行動があるのか？
column4:
Is there more about <NPC 681>'s 
behavior you haven't mentioned?

column3: フン――
column4: Hmph...

column3:
――オークよ
俺たちはナヴィドがどんな裏切りをしたか知り
罰を与えたいだけだ
column4:
—Orc, 
we seek only to uncover Navido's treachery 
and see him punished.

column3:
さぁ、聞かせてくれ――
人間の分際で、ナヴィドは
どんなことをしたか教えてくれ
column4:
So, tell us—
what did Navido do, despite being just a human?

column3:
――ガッハッハ！
人間ノ罰ナド、何ノ面白味モ無イガ
受ケルノガ、アノ人間ナラバ――面白ソウダ
column4:
Gahahaha! 
A human punishment is dull,
but if it's that man, it could be entertaining.

column3:
ヨク聞ケ！
アノ人間ハ、モウヒトツ取引シテイタ
column4:
Listen to me!
That human being is a deal breaker.

column3:
<COL ff2600>めがどヲ自ラ
我々、おーく軍ニアケ渡シ
物資ヤ戦利品、受ケ取ッテイタ！</COL>
column4:
<COL ff2600>Megado opened its gates to our Orc army
in exchange for supplies and spoils!</COL>

column3:
――メガドの功労者ナヴィド侯爵の
明るみになっていない事実
column4:
――The hidden truths
about Marquis Navido, the hero of Megado.

column3:
ナヴィドとオークの癒着――
ついに、決定的な悪事を突き止めたぞ
column4:
Navido and Orc collusion--
Finally, we've pinpointed the definitive evil!

column3: さぁ、詳しく聞き出さないとな
column4: Come on. We've got to get the details.

column3:
《証拠》のおかげでオークはやっと
<NPC 681>のことを思い出したようだな
そして――
column4:
Thanks to the evidence, the orc has finally
recalled <NPC 681>. And now――

column3:
奴は、自らメガドをオークに明け渡したこと――
オーク軍と交渉し、人間の統率を行う代わりに
オーク軍から報酬を受け取っていたことが分かった
column4:
It was revealed that he himself had
surrendered Megado to the orcs—
that he negotiated with the orc army
and received rewards from them in return
for managing the humans.

column3: 人間ノ分際デ――！
column4: For someone of his lowly human status—!

column3:
まさか、下っ端と思われたオークの口から
核心を聞き出すことができるとはな――
さぁ、さらに話を聞いて行こう
column4:
Who would have thought we'd get essential info 
from a lowly orc—
Let's keep probing for more.

column3:
メガドがあまりにも早く陥落したのは
ナヴィドの手引きがあったからか――
column4:
The reason Megado fell so quickly was 
because of Navido's assistance--

column3:
人間ガ――人間ノ分際デ
おーくト取引シヨウナド！
column4: A human—striking deals with orcs, of all things!

column3: そんな取引をオーク軍が許したのか？
column4: Did the orc army actually permit such a deal?

column3: グルァァ！！
column4: Grrr!

column3:
落ち着け、お前がなぜ怒るのか――教えてくれ
その取引に応じたのは――
column4:
Relax. 
Why does this anger you? 
Who made the deal?

column3: 俺ナラ！　許サナカッタ！
column4: It was me! I didn't approve!

column3:
ならば、応じたのは――お前の上官なんだな？
お前の意志ではなかったと
column4:
So, 
it was your superior who agreed to it, not you?

column3: ガァァァ！！！
column4: Gaaaaa!!

column3:
オーク軍にも酔狂な奴がいるもんだな
あるいは――その時にはまだ
人間と取引をする心の余裕があったのか
column4:
The Orc army has its own oddities. 
Alternatively――
maybe they still had some tolerance for 
negotiating with humans at that time.

column3: ウガァァァァ！！
column4: Ugaaaaa!!

column3:
まずいぞ、オークが興奮してきた――
だが話は繋がってきたな
column4:
This is bad, the Orc is getting agitated―― 
but the story is coming together.

column3:
ナヴィドはオークと取引し
降伏してメガドを明け渡した
column4:
Navido made a deal with the Orcs, 
surrendered, and handed over Megado.

column3:
そして占領下の市民たちを指揮し
まるで英雄のように振る舞っているが――
裏ではオークと癒着し私腹を肥やしていた
column4:
And while he leads the citizens under occupation 
and acts like a hero, behind the scenes he was 
colluding with the Orcs and enriching himself.

column3:
――とはいえ
オークの証言だけでは糾弾する証拠として
あまりにも弱い
column4:
-- Nevertheless, the orc's testimony alone 
is too flimsy to be considered solid 
evidence for an indictment.

column3:
何か、<NPC 681>が私腹を肥やしていたことの
具体的な《証拠》が無いことにはな――
column4:
Unless you have some
concrete "proof" that <NPC 681>
was lining his own pockets...

column3: 脅す
column4: Threaten

column4: Present the evidence

column3: ――やめる
column4: -- Stop

column3:
――これは？
日付や数字のリストのようだが――
column4:
-- what's this?
Looks like a list of dates and numbers--

column3: こ、これはまさか――
column4: This, this can't be...

column3: オーク軍の出納帳
column4: The orc army's ledger

column3: 侯爵家の出納帳
column4: Marquise's Treasurer's Ledger

column3: レジスタンスの出納帳
column4: Resistance Ledger

column3:
そうかこれを、オーク軍の物資収支と
照らし合わせることができれば――！
よくやったぞ、覚者！
column4:
I see. 
If we can cross-reference this with the 
orc army's supply and expenditure records—! 

Well done, Arisen!

column3:
よし――<COL ff2600>ここまでの証言は《証拠》として
メモにまとめておいた
しかるべき時に使ってくれ</COL>
column4:
Alright—
<COL ff2600>I've compiled the testimonies so far 
into evidence. Use it at the appropriate time.</COL>

column3:
さて――かなり核心には迫れたな
だが、このオークから聞けることはまだ残っている
最後まで気を引き締めて行けよ、相棒
column4:
Well— 
we've gotten quite close to the core of the matter. 
But there's still more to uncover from this orc. 
Stay sharp and focused until the end, partner.

column3:
まさか、オーク軍が<NPC 681>の取引に
応じるとはな――
<NPC 681>とオーク軍はズブズブの関係だった訳だ
column4:
It's surprising that the orc army would agree to 
<NPC 681>'s terms. 
Evidently, <NPC 681> and the orc army 
had a close relationship.

column3:
そしてこの "侯爵家の出納帳"という《証拠》――
これはその不正を暴くカギとなるだろう
column4:
And this "Marquise's Treasurer's Ledger" -
- will be the key to uncovering that fraud.

column3:
この帳簿を、オーク側の証拠と照らし合わせられれば
――確実に<NPC 681>の悪事を証明できるぞ
column4:
If we can match this ledger with 
the evidence on the orc side

-- we can certainly prove 
<NPC 681>'s wrongdoing!

column3:
さぁ、後はオーク軍側の証拠の在処さえ
聞きだせれば、すべて終わりだ
尋問は残すところあとわずか――頼んだぞ
column4:
Now, we just need to find out where the 
orc army's evidence is stored, 
and it will be all over. 

The interrogation is almost done—
give it your best effort.

column3: ナヴィドとオーク軍の癒着の証拠――
column4: Evidence of collusion between Navido and the orc forces--

column3:
運んだ伝令文書などは
まだ残っているのか？
column4:
Are the messenger documents you carried
still there?

column3: ――喋リ過ギタ
column4: --too chatty.

column3: 何だと？
column4: What did you say?

column3: コレ以上話サナイ
column4: I'll say no more.

column3: ――今更恐れをなしたのか？
column4: -- are you afraid now?

column3:
おーくハ恐レヲ知ラナイ！
ダガ、コレ以上喋ッタラ、裏切リダ
column4:
The orcs fear nothing! 
But if I say any more, it would be treachery.

column3:
フン、今更何を――
しかしこの重要な局面でだんまりとは厄介だな
column4:
Hmph, what's the point now--
Yet, staying silent at such a 
critical moment is troublesome.

column3:
癒着の決定的な証拠の在り処を
知っているのは、このオークだけだ――
覚者、何か打開策はないか？
column4:
The only one who knows where the definitive 
proof of collusion is, is this orc--
Any ideas, Arisen?

column3: オークに尋問し続ける
column4: Continue to interrogate Orc

column3: 専門家に相談しよう
column4: Let's talk to an expert

column3:
専門家――そうだ！
俺たちよりも良いアイデアを
持っていそうな奴がメガドにいるじゃないか！
column4:
Experts - yes!
There's a guy at Megado who might 
have a better idea than us!

column3: 冴えてるぞ、覚者！
column4: Brilliant, Arisen!

column3:
――決まりだな
<COL ff2600>また諜報へ出かけたら、奴を――
ガクシャを訪ねてみよう</COL>
column4:
--- It's decided. 
<COL ff2600>When we head out for intelligence work again, 
let's visit that scholar.</COL>

column3:
そ、そうか――分かった
もう一度、一通り尋ね直してみるのも
いいかもしれないな
column4:
I see—understood. 
It might be worth rechecking everything once more.

column3: コレ以上話スコトハナイ
column4: I won't talk any more.

column3: ――今更恐れをなしたのか？
column4: -- are you afraid now?

column3:
おーくハ恐レヲ知ラナイ！
ダガ、コレ以上喋ッタラ裏切リダ
column4:
The orcs fear nothing! 
But if I say any more, it would be treachery.

column3:
フン、今更何を――
しかしこの重要な局面でだんまりとは厄介だな
column4:
Hmph, what's the point now--
Yet, staying silent at such a 
critical moment is troublesome.

column3:
癒着の決定的な証拠の在り処を
知っているのは、このオークだけだ――
column4:
The only one who knows where the definitive 
proof of collusion is, is this orc--

column3:
覚者、まずはメガドにいた
オークに詳しい男に相談してみよう
きっと核心を突く《証拠》への道が拓けるはずだ
column4:
Arisen, start by seeking out the man
who knows about the orcs in Megado.
He could open the path to critical proof.

column3:
このオークを落とす最後の《証拠》――
それさえ手に入れてくれれば
あとは、俺が必ずなんとかする
column4:
The last piece of "evidence" to bring 
this orc down-- If you can get that,
I'll definitely take care of the rest.

column3: 脅す
column4: Threaten

column3: 《証拠》を突きつける
column4: Present the evidence

column3: ――やめる
column4: -- Stop

column3:
忠義を尽くそうとしても――
もう手遅れのようだぜ
column4:
Even if you try to be loyal--
it looks like it's too late for you, man.

column3: ナンダト！？
column4: What did you say!?

column3:
見ろ――メガドをうろついていた
オークが落としたものだ
column4:
Look-- it was dropped by the
orcs that were hanging around Megado.

column3:
お前を探す、オーク軍の指名手配書だ
オークが街に集まったのは、仲間を探すためではなく
お尋ね者を探すためだったようだな――？
column4:
This is a wanted poster from the Orc army, 
searching for you. 
It seems the orcs gathering in the city were not 
looking for allies, but for fugitives like you.

column3:
人間との取引後に突然姿を消したんだ
――裏切りと思われても仕方ないな
column4:
After the deal with the humans, 
he vanished without a trace. 
It's understandable that they 
would suspect betrayal.

column3:
ソ、ソンナ――嘘ダ！
俺ハ裏切ッテナイ――
column4:
N-No way... That's a lie! 
I haven't betrayed anyone--

column3:
まだ悪あがきするつもりか？
もうお前にオーク軍へ戻る道はない
column4:
Are you still trying to make a valiant stand?
There is no way for you to 
return to the Orc army now.

column3:
なぜなら――
もう多くのことを喋り過ぎちまったからな
column4:
Because--
I've already said too much.

column3: 脅す
column4: Threaten

column3: 《証拠》を突きつける
column4: Present the evidence

column3: ――やめる
column4: -- Stop

column3:
お前は興奮して
よく覚えていないかもしれんが――
column4:
You may not recall everything due to your 
excitement, but—

column3:
メガド陥落以降のオーク軍内部情報を
洗いざらい喋っちまってるんだ
――ここに内容の書き起こしも残ってる
column4:
You've blurted out all the internal details of 
the Orc army since Megado's fall. 
—There's even a written record of your statements.

column3: グゥ――グヌヌヌヌ――！！
column4: Gu -- Gunnununu --!

column3: もし捕まれば、確実に処刑は免れないだろう
column4: If captured, you'd certainly face execution.

column3:
だが――俺たちに協力すれば抜け道と
ほとぼりが冷めるまでの隠れ処を
提供してやるぞ
column4:
But... if you work with us, 
we'll offer a way out and a safe place to stay 
until the heat dies down.

column3: 人間！　キサマァ――！
column4: Damn you, human――!

column3:
望みはただ一つ――
メガド陥落以降の、ナヴィドとオーク軍の
癒着の証拠文書だ
column4:
The only thing I ask for is―― 
The documents proving Navido's collusion with the 
Orcs after the fall of Megado.

column3:
内通の伝達文書――
それと、オーク軍の物資出納帳簿も欲しい
column4:
The documents on internal communications―― 
and the Orc army's supply and 
expense ledger as well.

column3:
残っていなければお前は終わりだが――
メガドにまだ一つでも残っているなら助けてやる
――在り処を教えろ
column4:
If none remain, you're finished―― 
But if there is still at least one left in Megado, 
I'll save you. 

――Where is it?

column3: ――――グゥゥゥ
column4: ――――Guuu

column3:
グオオオオオオオオオオオオオオオ
オオオオオオオオオオオオオオオオ
オオオオオオオオオオオオオオオオ
オオオオオオオオオオオオオオオオ
column4: Graaaargh!

column3:
人間ノ分際デ――
ヒネリツブシテヤル！！
叩キツブシテヤル！！！
column4:
You humans—
I'll crush you!
I'll beat you to a pulp!

column3:
――――
――ワカッタ
column4:
――――
――I get it.

column3:
めがどノ外ニ、隠シ倉庫ガアル――
人間ドモ荒ラシテナケレバ
備蓄物資ト、書類ソノママ残ッテル
column4:
There is a hidden storage outside of Megado--
If the humans haven't destroyed it, stockpiles of 
supplies and documents will be left behind.

column3: よし――その場所を教えてもらおう
column4: Alright— tell us the location.
-- Arisen!!

column3:
書類さえ手に入れれば
ナヴィドに致命傷を与えられる！
――俺たちの任務はそれでほぼ完了だ
column4:
As long as we get the documents,
we can deliver the fatal blow to Navido!
--Our mission is almost complete.

column3:
メガド陥落の重罪人の情報を集め
糾弾するための証拠を集める――
column4:
Collect evidence and information on the main 
perpetrators of Megado's downfall 
to bring them to justice.

column3:
そしてしかるべき筋にその証拠を届ける
それが任務だ
column4:
And then deliver that evidence to the right sources.
That's the mission.

column3:
それにしてもオークのように強欲な奴だな
<NPC 681>と言う男は――
なぁ覚者、お前もそうは思わないか？
column4:
But still, he's as greedy as an orc, the man called
<NPC 681>--
Hey, Arisen, don't you think so, too?

column3: さて、仕上げにかかろう
column4: Now, let's finish up.

column3:
このオークは完全に落ちた――
聞き出せる情報を全て聞き出して
全て終わりにするんだ
column4:
The orc has fully surrendered—
retrieve all the details you can and 
finish everything.

column3:
このオークはもう落ちた――
全て聞き出してしまえばもう用済みだ
column4:
The orc is already defeated—
after getting all the information, 
it's no longer needed.

column3: Ａ、メガド陥落の理由
column4: A. The reason for the fall of Megado

column3: Ｂ、ナヴィド侯爵の交渉
column4: B. Marquis Navido's negotiations

column3: Ｃ、ナヴィド侯爵の汚職
column4: C, Marquis Navido's corruption

column3: Ｄ、<NPC 681>侯爵とオークの関係
column4: D, the association between Marquis <NPC 681> and the orcs.

column3: ――今日はやめる
column4: --I'm not doing this today.

column3:
メガドが陥落した理由――それは
<NPC 681>が手引きしたためだったのか？
column4:
Why did Megadi fall - 
was it because <NPC 681> led the way?

column3:
グゥゥ違ウ！！
めがどヲ陥落サセタノ、おーく軍ノ実力ダ！
column4:
Grrr, wrong!
It was the might of the Orc army that caused the
fall of Megado!

column3:
アノ人間ガ手引キシタコト――
ホンノ少シ、落トスノ早クナッタダケ
column4:
That human's guidance... It simply hastened the
fall by a little.

column3:
"王家は堕ち、継承者も行方不明
  これ以上戦う意味は無い"　ト――
臆病ナ、人間ラシイ考エダナ！
column4:
"The royal family has fallen, the heir is
missing. There is no point in fighting any
longer." – such a cowardly, human-like thought!

column3: 人間側に反発は無かったのか？
column4: Was there no resistance from the human side?

column3:
人間モ、おーくモ、反発スルモノ、イタ！
戦イ始メル者モイタ！
column4:
There were those who rebelled, both humans and
Orcs!
Some even started fighting!

column3: モチロン、全員処刑サレタ
column4: Of course, they were all executed.

column3:
メガドが陥落した後、<NPC 681>とオーク軍が
取引したと言っていたな？
詳しく内容を教えてくれ
column4:
You mentioned that after Megado fell, <NPC 681>
and the Orc forces made a deal?
Can you elaborate on that?

column3:
――めがどヲ奪ッタ後
人間ドモヲ、奴隷ニシテ使ッタ
アノ《ナヴィド》トカイウ人間モ、ソノ１人ダ
column4:
After taking Megado, he enslaved and exploited
humans.
That human called Navido is one of them.

column3:
ソシテ奴ハ、上官ヘ申シ出タ
「自分ノ方ガ、人間上手ク扱エル、任セテホシイ
  必ズ前ヨリ、多クノ成果ヲ出ス」――トナ
column4:
He petitioned his superior,
"I wish to be entrusted with the task, for I am
adept at handling humans. I will undoubtedly yield
greater results than before."

column3:
斬リ捨テヨウトシタガ、上官ハ勇気ヲ気ニ入ッタ
面白ガッテ任セタノダ――
column4:
He was about to cut him down, but his superior
was impressed by his courage and found it amusing,
so he assigned it to-

column3:
ヤツが生きているということは――
成功したんだな？
column4:
If he's still alive--
he made it, didn't he?

column3:
ソノ後、アノ人間ハ愚カニモ――
マルデ、おーく軍ノ
一員ニナッタヨウニ、振ル舞イダシタ
column4:
After that, that human fool began to behave as if
he had become a member of the great army.

column3:
<NPC 681>がオーク軍の戦利品や物資を
一部着服していた――確かか？
column4:
Is it true that <NPC 681> was embezzling spoils
and supplies from the Orc army?

column3:
人間ノ管理ヲ任サレテカラ――奴ノ振ル舞イハ
おーく軍ノ、一員ニナッタヨウダッタ
column4:
Since he was put in charge of humans— His
behavior began to resemble that of a member of the
Orc Army.

column3:
気安ク、おーくニ声ヲカケ――
会議ニモ、顔ヲ出スヨウニナッタ
column4:
Feeling at ease, he spoke to the orcs—
Even showing his face at their meetings.

column3:
なんだと――
そんなことが――許されたのか？
column4:
What the heck--
Is that-- is that allowed?

column3:
許サレヌ、人間ゴトキニ！！
シカシ、我ガ上官は――ソレヲ
「面白イ」ト言ッタ！
column4:
Forbidden, to one such as a human!! However, my
superior called it 'interesting'!

column3:
蓄エハ、豊カニナッタガ
<NPC 681>ハ、フザケタ要求ヲシテキタ
――報酬ヲヨコセト
column4:
Stocks are bountiful, but <NPC 681> came with a
ridiculous demand—
"Hand over the reward."

column3:
――上官ハ――
戦イノ戦利品ヤ、物資ノ一部ヲ
アノ人間ニ流スコト、許可シタノダ！
column4:
--The superior officer-- allowed some of the
spoils and supplies from the war to go to the
human beings!

column3: 得た報酬を――<NPC 681>はどうしたんだ？
column4: What did <NPC 681> do with the reward obtained?

column3:
知ラン！
ソノ後、覚者ガ攻メコミ――
我々ハ撤退シタ
column4:
I know not! After that, the Arisen began their
assault—we were forced to retreat.

column3: ――――驚いたな
column4: ――――I'm surprised.

column3:
あの古ダヌキは――
メガドを売り渡したどころじゃない
オークと一緒になってメガドを蹂躙していたんだ――
column4:
That old fox——he did more than just sell out
Megado.
He conspired with the Orcs to desecrate it.

column3:
メガドが奪還された後――
<NPC 681>とオーク軍はどうなったんだ？
column4:
After Megado was reclaimed—
What happened to <NPC 681> and the Orc army?

column3:
我々ハ――めがどヲ撤退シタガ
アノ人間ハ、被害者面シテ、めがどニ残ッタ
column4:
We have retreated from Megado, but that human,
playing the victim, remained behind.

column3:
ダガ――コノ間、奴カラ使者ガ来タ
"うるさく嗅ぎ回られるかもしれない
  兵を貸してほしい"――ト！
column4:
But――recently, a messenger came from him, saying,
"We might be sniffed out if we make too much
noise. Lend us some soldiers!"

column3:
斬リ捨テヨウトシタガ、相手ガ覚者ナラバ――
我々ハ可能ナ範囲デ、兵ヲ派遣シタ
column4:
I considered cutting them down, but if the
opponent is an Arisen—
We sent the troops we could.

column3:
ヤツは、自身の屋敷に誘い込む作戦に失敗した後
独自の兵でなんとか始末しようとしたようだが――フン
column4:
It seems that after failing to lure someone into
his mansion, he attempted to deal with the
situation using his own troops—Hmph.

column3:
人間ダケノチカラデハ、スグ限界ダ
マタ援軍要請ガ来テ
おーく軍ハ応エルタメ、俺ヲ派遣シタ――
column4:
Human power will soon reach its limits.
Another call for reinforcements arrived.
The orc army sent me to respond――

column3: ――――そして、今に至るわけか
column4: ---- and now you're here.

column3:
なるほど――
メガド奪還後も、関係が続いていたわけだな
column4:
I see --
So their relationship continued even after Megado
was recaptured.

column3:
つまり、<STG 473>で覚者が襲われたのも
憲兵たちがやけに絡んできたことも
街中をオークが我が物顔でうろつきだしたことも――
column4:
In other words, the incident where the Arisen was
attacked at <STG 473>, the unusual involvement of
the Military Police, and even the Orcs brazenly
roaming the streets—all of these events are
connected.

column3:
――全て、覚者たちに
自分の罪を暴かれることを恐れた
<NPC 681>が仕組んだ死の罠だったってことか
column4:
So it was a trap of death orchestrated by <NPC 681>
, who feared having their sins exposed by the
Arisen.

column3:
――このオークから聞けるのは
こんなところか
column4: That seems to be all we can learn from this Orc.

column3: ウグググ―――
column4: Ugggghhhhhhh...

column3:
――あぁ、オークの処遇なら心配するな
約束を破るようなことはしない
column4:
Ah, worry not about the treatment of the Orcs. We
shall not break our promise.

column3:
これで、十分な確証を手に入れた
明日証拠を受け渡し、俺たちは侯爵邸に
忍び込み<NPC 681>を捕える――
column4:
With this, we have obtained sufficient proof.
Tomorrow, we will hand over the evidence and
infiltrate the Marquis's mansion to capture <NPC 681>
.

column3:
だがひとまずは、これで尋問完了だ
ここまで、本当によくやってくれたな
オークを尋問するとなった時は
どうなることかと思ったが――
column4:
But for now, this concludes the interrogation.
You've done very well up to this point. I had my
doubts when it came to interrogating an Orc—

column3:
本当に頼もしい奴だ――
ここまで付き合ってくれて、感謝する
最後までもう少し、頼むぞ！
column4:
You are truly a dependable ally!
I appreciate you sticking with me this far.
Just a little more to go, so please hang in there!

column3:
おい！！
こいつの顔を、知らないはずないだろう
オーク軍を殲滅した覚者本人だ！
column4:
Hey!!
You should definitely know this person's face.
It's the Arisen who annihilated the Orc army!

column3:
つまり、死んだ方がマシだって目に
遭わせることもできるんだ
幸い――お前は人間ではなく、憎きオークだからな
column4:
In other words, I can make you wish you were
dead.
You are not human, but a detestable orc, after
all.

column3: ――――人間ノ脅シハ、ソノ程度カ？
column4: Is that the extent of the humans' threat?

column3:
グァッハッハ！　おーくノ拷問ニ比ベレバ
ソンナ脅シ、屁デモナイ！
column4:
Guhahaha!
Compared to orc torture, it's not a threat, it's
a fart!

column3:
ならば、試してみるか？
人間式の拷問を！
column4:
Then why don't we give it a try?
Human-style torture!

column3:
フン――
おーくハ、人間ノ何倍モ痛ミニ強イ
ヤッテミロ
column4:
Hmph...
Orcs are several times more resistant to pain
than humans.
Try it.

column3:
――チッ、オークに高圧的な脅しは効かないか
やはり、まずは現場を調査し《証拠》を
突きつけなければ始まらないようだな――
column4:
--Tch, I guess coercive threats don't work on
orcs.
I guess we have to investigate the scene and
confront it with the "evidence" first...

column3:
他のオークを捕えて
拷問で無理やり読ませてもいいんだぞ――
column4:
Capturing another Orc and forcing it to read
through torture is also permissible.

column3:
フン――ソコラ辺ノおーくヲ
捕マエタトコロデ、読メハシナイ
column4:
Hmph.
Even though we captured that orc over there, it's
not like we can read its mind.

column3: なんだと？
column4: What!?

column3:
暗号ダ！
雑兵ニ読ムコトデキナイ！
――モチロン人間ニモダ！
column4:
It's encrypted! The foot soldiers can't read it!
— Of course, not even humans!

column3:
なるほど、オーク軍の暗号文書か――
ならばコイツ以外の
"特殊知識を持った人物" を探す必要があるな
column4:
I see... Orc military coded documents... Then we
need to find someone other than this guy who has
"special knowledge".

column3:
人探しとなれば――
メガドの、あの女の出番だな？
column4:
If it's a search for someone—then it's time for
that Woman from Megado, isn't it?

column3:
オーク軍は力を溜めて
お前を助けに戻ってくるだと？
なぜそう言い切れる？
column4:
The Orc army is gathering strength to come back
and aid you? Why are you so certain of this?

column3:
おーくハ昔カラ
"ヤラレタラヤリカエス"――
ソウシテ生キ抜キ、軍ヲ拡ゲテキタ
column4:
Orcs have always lived by the principle of 'If
you're attacked, strike back.' They have survived
and expanded their army by adhering to this creed.

column3:
オ前ラ人間ノヨウニ、根拠モ無ク
愚カナ望ミヲ抱クコト、全ク違ウ！
おーくニハ、伝統ト誇リガアルノダ
column4:
You humans, unlike Orcs, embrace foolish hopes
without any basis.
We Orcs have traditions and pride!

column3:
ほう――相当な確信があるようだ
単なる盲信という訳ではないのかもしれないな
column4:
Well - you seem pretty sure.
Maybe it's not just blind faith.

column3:
メガドでも何らかの変化が起きているかもしれない
覚者、目撃者がいないか一度調査してみよう
column4:
There may be some changes occurring in Megado.
Arisen, let us investigate to see if there are any
witnesses.

column3:
おい――とぼけるなよ
伝令兵だったんだろうが！
column4:
Hey -- don't play dumb with me.
I know you were a messenger!

column3:
フン、上官ノ気マグレデ
生カサレタ人間ノ顔ナド
イチイチ覚エテル訳ガナイ！
column4:
Hmph, as if I have any reason to remember the
faces of humans the officers let live!

column3:
人間――オ前タチハ、食ウタメニ飼ウ豚ノ
名前イチイチ覚エルノカ？
column4:
Humans—do you remember the name of every pig you
raise for slaughter?

column3:
タトエ、毎日会ッタ人間ダトシテモ
顔ハトモカク
名前マデ覚エル気ニハナランナ
column4:
Every day I meet people.
Their faces are all different.
I don't want to learn your names.

column3:
顔か――あれだけ特徴的な顔を何度も見れば
覚えていない訳がない
覚者、ヤツの顔に関するものを突きつけてみろ！
column4:
If you've seen that distinctive face so many
times, there's no way you wouldn't remember it.
Arisen, present something related to their face!

column3:
おい、話すんだ――
メガド占領中の、<NPC 681>について全て！
column4:
Hey, I want you to speak—
Tell me everything about <NPC 681> during the
Megado occupation!

column3:
グァァ！
アノ人間ハ――気ニ食ワナイ
column4: Ugh! That person-- no, I don't like it!

column3:
おい、どういうことだ？
<NPC 681>が市民に慕われるような――
本当にそんな行動をしていたのか？
column4:
Hey, what's going on here?
Was <NPC 681> really acting in a way that would
make them popular with the citizens?

column3:
ガウウウ――知ルカ！
人間ドモガ、アイツノ行動ヲ
ドウ思ウカナド、おーくニハ関係ナイ！
column4:
Grrr! Who cares! It doesn't matter what those
humans think of his actions!

column3:
チッ――この様子だと
１から聞き出すのは時間がかかりそうだぜ
まずは軽く証拠をとりたいところだが――
column4:
Hmm... It seems like it would take a while to
extract everything from scratch.
First, it would be best to gather some evidence
quickly...

column3:
このオークよりも近くで当時、
<NPC 681>と共に行動していた人物――
誰でもいい、とにかく探して話を聞くぞ！
column4:
Anyone who was close to <NPC 681> and acted
alongside them, I don't care who, we need to find
them and hear their story!

column3:
もちろん証拠はあるんだろうな！
まさか、その話だけを鵜呑みにしろというのか！？
column4:
Of course there must be evidence! You're not
suggesting we simply take their word for it, are
you?!

column3: ガルルルル！！
column4: Grrrrrr!

column3:
あぁ、くそ！
大事なところだってのに――
column4:
Ah, damn it!
Right at a crucial moment...

column3:
ダメだ、話ができる状態じゃない――
だが今の話を元に、存在するかも分からない
《証拠》を俺たちで探さないといけないのか！
column4:
This is bad, they're not in any condition to
talk――
But based on what we've just discussed, it seems
we'll have to search for evidence that may or may
not even exist!

column3:
オーク側のモノでも、侯爵側のモノでもいい
文書、手紙、帳簿、なんでもいい！
何か心当たりはないか！？
column4:
Whether it's something from the Orcs side or the
Marquis, either is fine.
Documents, letters, ledgers, anything will do!
Do you have any leads?

column3:
このオークは、完全に恐怖している
もう脅す必要はない――
column4:
This Orc is completely terrified.
There is no need to threaten them--

column3:
覚えているか？
ガクシャが言っていたことを――
"真に恐怖したとき、与える一撃は致命傷になる"
column4:
Do you remember?
What Raksha said――
"When you truly feel fear, a single blow can be
fatal."

column3:
ヤツが最も恐れているのは、裏切りの事実――
それを認めたくないんだ
column4:
What he fears most is the fact of his betrayal --
he doesn't want to admit it.

column3:
おそらくこれが最後になるだろう
さぁ、裏切りを証明する《証拠》――
それを突きつけてやれ！
column4:
This is probably going to be the last chance.
Now, the evidence of betrayal―― confront them with
it!

column3:
いい加減にしろ！
今さらしらばっくれようとしても無駄だぞ！
column4:
Enough already!
It's useless to try and play dumb at this point!

column3:
裏切リ者ニハ、死ヨリモ苦シイ拷問――
――俺ハ裏切リ者違ウ！
助ケニ来タ仲間ニ、説明スレバ分カル！
column4:
Those who betray face torture worse than death――
I am not a traitor! If I explain to my comrades
who have come to help, they will understand!

column3:
拷問は怖くない――
そうじゃなかったのか！？
column4: I'm not afraid of torture―― Wasn't that the case?!

column3:
おーくノ拷問――
人間ナド、耐エラレズ死ヌダロウ
ダカラ、裏切ッタ者、今マデイナイ！
column4:
Orc torture---
humans can't take it, they die.
That's why none have ever betrayed us.
-Damn it!

column3:
あとひとつ――
この頑なさを揺るがせる《証拠》が
何かひとつあれば！！
column4:
Just one more thing...
If there is just one more piece of evidence that
can shake this stubbornness!!

column3:
覚者！　打開策はメガドにあるはずだ
オークの専門家――ガクシャだ
ガクシャに会いに行ってみるぞ！！
column4:
Arisen! The solution must lie in Megado.
An expert on Orcs -- Raksha.
Let's go see Raksha!!

column3:
ナヴィド・クルト――
貴様だけは絶対に許さない！
column4:
Navido Kurt-
I will never forgive you!

column3:
愚かなメフィス、そして異国の覚者よ――
一体誰に刃を向けている
column4:
Oh foolish Mephis, and Arisen from a foreign land—
against whom is your blade drawn?

column3:
貴様こそ
一体どういう状況か分かっているのか？
column4:
You're the one who should ask yourself:
Do you really understand the situation at all?

column3: 悪事は全て暴かれたんだ
column4: All the wrongdoing has been exposed.

column3:
明日の朝にはクルト侯爵逮捕と
その悪事の数々が、街を賑わせていることだろう
column4:
By tomorrow morning, Marquis Kurt will have been
arrested, and his numerous wicked deeds will
surely be causing a commotion in the city.

column3:
悪事だと？
私がいなければこの王都は今頃――
column4:
Wicked deeds?
If I were not here, this Royal Capital would by
now...

column3:
愚かな兄による無為な戦火により
灰燼に帰していたのだ！
column4:
It has been burned to ashes by the futile war
caused by my foolish brother!

column3:
この王都が残ったのも犠牲者があの程度で
済んだのも、誰のおかげだと思っている
column4:
Who do you think is responsible for the fact that
this royal city remained and the casualties were
kept to a minimum!

column3:
貴様が抗う間も与えず死に追いやった多くの国民や
エミル公爵がそんな言い訳で納得するとでも？
column4:
Do you think Duke Emil will accept such excuses
for the many citizens you've sent to their deaths
without a fight?

column3: フン――
column4: Hmph...

column3:
覚者よ、大局を読む目を持つ貴様なら
理解できるだろう？
column4:
Arisen, if you have the vision to see the broader
perspective, you should be able to understand,
shouldn't you?

column3:
散々命を狙っておきながら、理解しろだと――
ふざけるな！
column4:
You've been trying to kill me for years, and now
you want me to understand...
Don't be ridiculous!

column3: その汚い口で、こいつに話しかけるんじゃない！
column4: Do not address him with that foul mouth!

column3: ――そうか、残念だが仕方ない
column4:
――I see. It is unfortunate, but it cannot be
helped.

column3: ならば明日の朝、街を賑わせる話題は――
column4:
In that case, tomorrow morning, the talk of the
town will be――

column3:
レジスタンスの壊滅
そして英雄の死となることだろう
column4:
The resistance will be crushed, and spell the
death of a hero.

column3: 来るぞ――気を引き締めろ！
column4: Here it comes... Brace yourself!

column3: 隊長、見てください、あの魔物――
column4: Captain, look there! Those monsters...

column3:
ほら、魔物のまわりに散らばっているのは――
報告にあった盗品ですよ
column4:
Look, scattered around the enemy are the stolen
goods mentioned in the report.

column3:
きっと、あいつが盗賊達をペロリと
食べてしまった――そういうことですよね
column4:
Surely, he devoured all those bandits without a
trace. That must be what happened.

column3:
ガルドリンとリズはまだ来ていないし
この勝負、俺の勝ち――
column4:
Gurdolin and Lise still haven't shown up, this
bout is mine—

column3: うわッ！
column4: Ah!

column3: 隊長、魔物が！
column4: Captain, the enemy...!

column3:
とんだ強敵でしたね、隊長！
俺たちじゃなかったら危なかったですよ
column4:
Quite the tough adversary, Captain!
It could have been risky without us.

column3: さて、盗品を拾い集めて帰りましょうか
column4:
Now then, let's gather the stolen goods and head
back.

column3: ふふふ――
column4: Hehehe...

column3:
ははは――
これで俺が一番って証明された訳だ
column4:
Hahaha...
This proves that I am the mightiest.

column3: いやだな、つい笑顔が――
column4: Oh no, I can't help but smile...

column3: なんでしょう、これ、とても嬉しいです
column4: I don't know why, I feel so joyful.

column3:
盗賊は盗賊でも、今回ばかりは
濡れ衣だったようだな
column4:
Though a thief, this one seems to have been
falsely accused this time.

column3: ここも違うのかぁ
column4: Even this place is different, huh?

column3:
どこに行ったのかなあ
逃げ得だけは絶対許したくないですよね
column4:
I wonder where they went...
We absolutely cannot allow them
to get away with this.

column3: やあ、調子はどう？
column4: Hello, how are you doing?

column3: なんだファビオ、邪魔しに来たか
column4:
What's up, Fabio?
You here to bother me?

column3:
いやいや
あれから神殿では――
column4:
No, no.
Since then, at the Temple...

column3:
誰が隊長の右腕にふさわしいか
賭けになっていてね
column4:
Who is worthy to be the right hand
of the Captain? It's become a bet,
you know.

column3: 様子を見に来たってわけさ
column4: I came to see how things are going.

column3: 賭けなら俺も呼べ
column4: If it's a bet, count me in.

column3: そんなことに賭けるの？　あきれた
column4:
You're betting on something like that?
Unbelievable.

column3:
そんなこととはなんだよ
隊長の右腕になるってことは特別ってことだ――
column4:
What's the big deal about that?
Becoming the Captain's right hand
means something special――

column3: 一番頼りにされているってことだろ
column4: It means they're relying on you the most.

column3:
それなら――
わたしとガルドリンは、一歩リードしてるよね
column4:
In that case, I guess...
Gurdolin and I are one step ahead, right?

column3:
倒した敵の強さで言やぁ
俺が一番役に立ってるだろうな
column4:
In the realm of battle, the strength of the
enemies I've defeated speaks for itself.
I must be the most useful one here.

column3:
何よ
物を探し出すのは、わたし、得意なんだから！
column4:
What's with that attitude?
Finding things is my specialty, you know!

column3: これから挽回するわよ！　ねー、隊長！
column4:
I'll make up for it from now on!
Right, Captain?

column3:
ああもう、時間がもったいない！
俺は行きますから
column4:
Oh, come on, we're wasting time!
I'm going.

column3: なんであんなにムキになるんだ？
column4: Why are you getting so worked up?

column3: ファビオ、俺は俺に賭けといてくれ
column4: Fabio, bet on me, okay?

column3: 他の洞窟を当たってみるか
column4: Shall we try hitting up another cave?

column3:
わたしは――わたしはどうしよう！
とにかく、探しに行く！
column4:
What should I do... What should I do!
Anyway, I'll go search!

column3: こりゃ面白い！
column4: This is getting interesting!

column3:
これは――
第一のアークと同じか？
column4:
Is this...
The same as the first Ark?

column3: ああ、俺にはそう見える
column4: Yeah, that's how it looks to me.

column3:
クラウスはすでに
この紋章を見ていたのだな？
column4: Did Klaus already see this Coat of Arms?

column3: そのはずだ
column4: That's to be expected.

column3:
いったい、この紋章には
どんな意味があるんだ？
column4:
What exactly is the meaning
of this Coat of Arms?

column3: 錬金術師ディアマンテスの――
column4: Of Alchemist Diamantes...

column3: はい、そこまで
column4: Yep, that's about it.

column3: イリス！
column4: Iris！

column3: ジョゼフ、久しぶり
column4: Joseph, long time no see.

column3:
得意になって喋ってると
殺しちゃうよ？
column4:
If you keep getting cocky,
I might just have to kill you, you know?

column3:
もっとも、誰もここから
出す気はないけどね
column4:
Well, no one here has any plans
to let you go anyway.

column3: 元気そうだな
column4: You look well.

column3: レオのおかげ
column4: Thanks to Leo.

column3:
あっさりわたしを切り捨てようと
してくれた、あんたのおかげ
column4:
It was because of you
that they so easily discarded me!

column3: おい、ジョゼフを神殿へ送り届けろ
column4: Hey, get Joseph back to the Temple.

column3:
そうはいかないな
物知りさんは邪魔だからね
column4:
It's not going to be that easy.
That old know-it-all is getting in the way.

column3:
そのデカイのを頼む
俺はイリスを引き受ける！
column4:
I'll handle the big one.
Iris!

column3:
くっ――敵の増援だ！
よし、ジョゼフを外へ
column4:
Damn, more reinforcements!
Alright, get Joseph out of here!

column3: すまない――世話になるよ
column4:
My apologies.
I appreciate the help.

column3: オマイら――たったそれだけか？
column4: You all... is that really all you've got?

column3: 来るならもっと大勢でたのむって
column4: You should have sent a larger force.

column3: もう、ちまちま、面倒くさい！
column4: Ugh, this is such a hassle!

column3: まあ　いいか――
column4: Well, whatever.

column3: 花の如く香るオークども！
column4: You Orcs, smelling like flowers!

column3:
オマイらを見下す人間どもを
思う存分やってしまえ！
column4:
Go ahead and show those humans
who look down on you what you're capable of!

column3: そして――
column4: And then--

column3:
貧相な人間ども！
オマイらも負けずに殺せ！
column4:
Pathetic humans!
Don't let them defeat you; kill them too!

column3: ――命に敬意を払え
column4: ...Have some respect for life.

column3:
俺がこいつを抑える！
おまえは道を切り開け！
column4:
I'll hold this one back!
You clear the path!

column3: ほーれ、ほーれ！
column4: Look, look!

column3: ほーれ、ほーれ！
column4: Look, look!

column3: これは素晴らしい――
column4: This is magnificent...

column3: 有り余る命！
column4: There is an abundance of life!

column3: 有り余る力！
column4: Abundant power!

column3: そうはさせるか！
column4: I won't let that happen!

column3:
まさか――
命が――おれの命が――
column4:
No way... My life...
My life is...

column3:
生きたい――
死にたくない――
column4: I want to live, I don't want to die!

column3: 《ゲート》を開くのは――おれなのに――
column4: Opening the "Gate" is... up to me...

column3: よし、器を回収するんだ
column4: Alright, let's retrieve the Vessel.

column3:
神殿へ帰ろう
命を白竜に捧げるんだ
column4:
Let us depart back to the Temple
and offer the lives to the White Dragon.

column3:
それ以上近づくな
やり合いたいわけではない
column4:
Stay back.
I have no intention of fighting.

column3:
騎士団長に傷を負わせてそれだけか
釈明くらいしてみろ
column4:
You dare raise your blade against the knight captain?
How about offering an explanation?

column3:
言葉など証の役には立たない！
時間の無駄だ
column4:
Words won't prove anything!
It's a waste of time.

column3:
騎士団をそこまで下に見ていたとはな
見損なったぞ
column4:
Underestimating the Knights Order to that extent!
You've disappointed me.

column3:
俺はまだ俺のままだという確信がある
この手応えがあるうちは俺に任せてくれ
column4:
I still believe I'm true to myself.
Trust me as long as I feel this sense of conviction.

column3:
敵はあのイリスを惑わせるほどだ
近づくのは俺だけでいい
column4:
The enemy is capable of confusing Iris.
It's best if only I approach.

column3:
俺の様子がおかしいと思ったら
遠慮はするな――斬れ
column4:
If you think something is wrong with me...
Do not hold back. Cut me down.

column3:
あとのことはクラウスと相談して決めろ
ああ、ジョゼフへの敬意も忘れるなよ
column4:
Discuss the rest with Klaus and decide.
Ah, don't forget to pay respects to Joseph too.

column3:
今の戦い、加減したな？　もう誰も信用ならん！
あの器、俺が取り戻す！
column4:
You were holding back in that fight, weren't you?
Can't trust anyone anymore!
I'll take that vessel back!

column3: くそっ――
column4: Damn it...!

column3: おれにかまうな！　やってしまえ！
column4: Don't bother with me! Just do it!

column3: (息遣い)
column4: (Breathing)

column3: (息遣い)
column4: (Breathing)

column3: (息遣い)
column4: (Breathing)

column3: (息遣い)
column4: (Breathing)

column3: なんだ！？　何が起こった！？
column4: What's happening?! What's going on?!

column3:
くそっ！　まずは負傷者を保護して船に戻る！
神殿には情報が集まっているはずだ
column4:
Damn it!
First, we must protect the wounded
and get back to the ship!
The temple should have the information we need.

column3:
気をつけて――変な奴がいる！
ほら――来た！
column4:
Watch out—there's someone suspicious!
Look—here they come!

column3: やった――
column4: We did it!

column3:
ふう――助かった
じゃあ、調査の続きを――
column4:
Phew... I'm saved.
Well then, let's continue the investigation...

column3: 待ちなさい――クラウス、待って
column4: Wait... Klaus, wait.

column3:
あんたの意見を尊重して
調査を引き延ばした結果――
column4:
As a result of respecting your opinion
and thus, prolonging the investigation...

column3:
こんなことになってしまった
これ以上、認めるわけにはいかない
column4:
It's turned out like this.
I can't let you continue any further.

column3:
でも――でも、分かるだろ？
これはよその世界から来たんだ
column4:
But— but, you understand, right?
They came from another world.

column3: ほら――
column4: Don't you see...?

column3:
本物の《溶命炉》だよ？
実在したんだ――やっぱり――
column4:
Is this the genuine Furnace?
It actually exists! Just like I thought!

column3: 帰ろう――
column4: Let's go home...

column3:
クラウスはわたしが責任を持って
運ぶからさ
column4: I'll be responsible for carrying him back.

column3: 全部わたしのせいだな
column4: It's all my fault.

column3:
あのさ――
報告、任せるよ
column4:
Hey, listen...
I'll leave the report to you.

column3:
わたしは――
レオに会わせる顔がないや
column4: I... don't have it in me to face Leo.

column3: やあ、お疲れさま
column4: Hey, well done.

column3: まず、僕から説明することがある
column4: First, there is something I must explain.

column3: 現段階において――
column4: At this stage...

column3:
ディアマンテスは街の一角に
封じられた状態なんだ
column4:
Diamantes is sealed away
at a location in the city.

column3:
白竜様が街を次元の歪みに
封じた後――
column4:
After the White Dragon sealed the town
in a dimensional distortion...

column3:
さらにテオドールたちが
ディアマンテスを閉じ込めたんだ
column4:
Theodor and the others even
managed to imprison Diamantes.

column3:
でも、奴は封印の中から
力を発揮できるわけだから――
column4:
However, he can still exert his power
from within the seal, so...

column3:
これはもう封印の術が解けかかっていると
考えるしかない――つまり時間がないんだ
column4:
We can now only assume that the seal
is already starting to unravel...
In other words, time is running out.

column3:
だから、我々の手で封印を解いて
先手を打つしかない
column4:
So, we must unseal it ourselves
and make the first move.

column3:
まあ、問題は幾つかあるが――
まず、封印の鍵を手に入れよう
column4:
Well, there are a few problems, but first,
we must obtain the key to the seal.

column3:
鍵は、このメルゴダを守護する
巨人兵が持っている
column4:
The key is held by the Giant Warriors
who guard Mergoda.

column3:
きみたち――ご苦労だが
巨人兵を探して、鍵を手に入れてくれ
column4:
Good sers, I know it's a lot to ask,
but please find the Giant Warriors
and retrieve the key.

column3:
おお――鍵を手に入れたのか！？
そうそう、それだ――間違いない
column4:
Oh, did you get the key?!
Yes, that's the one.
There's no mistake.

column3:
巨人兵は手強かっただろう？
え？　レオが助けてくれた！？
column4:
The Giant Warriors were formidable, weren't they?
Eh? Leo helped you?!

column3:
そうか――
でも、どうしてまた姿を消したのかな
column4:
I see...
But I wonder why he disappeared again.

column3:
おそらくディアマンテスがいとも簡単に
人の心を操作してしまうことを知っていて――
column4:
Perhaps it's because he knows all too well
how easily Diamantes can manipulate
people's hearts...

column3:
わたしらだっていつ裏切るかわからないと
考えている
column4: Even we don't know we might betray each other.

column3: レオに限ってそんなことはありません！
column4: But Leo would never do such a thing!

column3:
まあいい――さあ、鍵が手に入ったんだ
次の段階の話をしよう
column4:
Well, never mind...
Now that we have the key,
let's talk about the next stage.

column3: クラウス、君から話してあげなさい
column4: Klaus, please tell me everything.

column3: 来て頂けましたね
column4: I'm glad you could come.

column3:
さて、状況があらたまったところで
皆様にお願いがあります
column4:
Now with the situation having settled,
I have a favor to ask of all of you.

column3: 面倒に巻きこもうってんじゃねえよな
column4: Things have gotten quite troublesome, huh?

column3:
我々は――あの悪しき竜は
火竜様の血肉と竜力で生み出されたと考えています
column4:
We believe that Evil Dragon
was born from the flesh and Dragon Force
of the Fire Dragon.

column3: もしそうでなければ――
column4: If that is not the case...

column3:
王子が受け継ぐべき、竜の力は無く
次代の竜を失ったこの大陸は滅ぶでしょう
column4:
Without the dragon's power to be inherited
by the prince, this continent, having lost
the next generation of dragons, will perish.

column3:
王子が受け継ぐべき竜の力の存在は
どうやって確認をするんです？
column4:
How do we confirm the existence of the dragon's
power that the prince should inherit?

column3:
残念ながら私どもには――
あなたたちなら何かご存知ではないかと――
column4:
Unfortunately,
we were hoping that perhaps,
you might know something...

column3: 見極めは僕がやります
column4: I'll be the judge of that.

column3:
王子、危険だ！
見極めるためには竜に近づかねばならん
column4:
Prince, it is dangerous!
We must get closer to the dragon to find out.

column3: それでも、僕の役目です
column4: Still, it is my duty.

column3: さすが王子――だね
column4: True to form, Prince.

column3: 応援するからね！
column4: I've got your back!
